connect20/morningtime_textfieldlayeredna.name: connect20/Morningtime_TextfieldLayeredNav

suggest.magento-hackathon/magento-composer-insta: Allows to manage this package as a dependency

connect20/morningtime_textfieldlayeredna.description: Until now, you could only use Dropdown and Multiselect attributes for layered navigation. This extension adds a new texfield element, called textfilter.
